title: "How 'AI For Good' Is Changing The Energy Landscape"
excerpt: "The real value of energy algorithms lies in the detail. The most sophisticated AI can detect which appliances a customer has, their energy usage, time of use, appliance size and fuel type (electricity or gas) and type of appliance with the same fuel type (such as central AC versus room AC)."
